title: In game live reporting/ report trolls to /ff before 20 minutes
body:
In my opinion trolls are rewarded in this game, and a majority of them go unreported. It's been like this since beta. They hold most of the power and honest players are made to endure them for at least 20 minutes if not much longer! (seeing as you can't ff if trolls occupy 2 of the 5 slots in a team). The other problem is that players are usually only ever banned if they troll consistently, it doesn't account for single match experience of any user at any time which lets a lot of 'toxicity' slip through.

Problem: 1 person can ruin the game for both teams, 1 team is annoyed at someone intentionally feeding because they lose, the other team gets an unsatisfactory victory, both teams lose and the troll wins.

Solution: In game report feature, people on both teams can report someone for trolling, reaching the threshold of people for a ban or whatever allows people to leave the game safely (but not the person who was reported).

Complications: Abuse (in the same capacity that people can abuse the report feature normally, but in this way it ends the game), could solve by making it ban worthy to report incorrectly. 

Or maybe a solution like; if someone is completely negative on your team with no cs and is obviously trolling in a tier of matchmaking were they don't have an excuse then just let the other players DC. 

thoughts?
